title: Executive Order 6835-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision VIII, of the Civil-Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the provisions of the last sentence of the eighth paragraph of subdivision second of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), paragraph 11, subdivision VIII of schedule A of the civil-service rules is hereby amended to read as follows:
"11. Six special agents of the Division of Investigations, Office of the Secretary, to investigate fraudulent entries and other matters of a criminal nature."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6835-Amendment of Schedule A, Subdivision VIII, of the Civil-Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373191
